title: Hypnotic circle, Magnetism & immediate inductions
description:
In this video you will see strong hypnosis in a group with Dr Paret's non verbal and mesmeric techniques. Non-verbal hypnosis and mesmeric techniques are a powerful tool for emotional,spiritual and physical well being. With this deep healing processes we can easily rebalance the inner energy bringing well-being and regeneration.

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
